hadiths.text: ‘Abd Allah b. ‘Umar said :When two men who came from the east made a speech and the people were charmed with their eloquence, the Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) said: In some eloquent speech there is magic

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْمُتَشَدِّقِ فِي الْكَلاَمِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been narrated about eloquent speech
